properties.areaDesc: Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge; The Little Rockies
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 31 at 3:14AM MST until February 1 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Red Flag
Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in
effect from 8 AM to 11 PM MST Saturday.

* AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 135, 136 and 137.

* TIMING...8 AM TO 11 PM Saturday.

* WINDS...Southwest at 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. Over
the Little Rockies, expect winds at 25 to 35 mph with gusts up
to 60 mph.

* RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent.

* IMPACTS...New fire starts will spread quickly and become
difficult to control.
properties.instruction:
Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these
areas of this Red Flag Warning.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 PM MST SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 135, 136 AND 137
